title: Cross-functional Frontend Web Developer
description:
As a cross-functional frontend developer, I moved across teams based on need, acting both as a hands-on developer and as a frontend technical guide.
I primarily built solutions for warehouse operations at Inditex, including inventory management, inbound and outbound logistics, and operational analytics.
Tech Stack: Typescript, HTML, CSS, React, ReactQuery, Zustand, Vitest, Cypress, Github Actions, Copilot.
